text:
Riverdale stars KJ Apa and Cole Sprouse are notorious for their near-constant teasing and trolling of one another on social media. While the two are good pals, they never miss an opportunity to poke a little fun at each other or embarrass each other should the moment arise.

Their latest online exchange? KJ recently posted a meme of himself and Cole side-by-side when they were actually teens — you know, the ages Archie Andrews and Jughead Jones are supposed to be? (KJ is 21 and Cole is 25.) To accompany the pic, KJ wrote, “Man, I would have absolutely crushed you at age 17. Crushed.” He also added, "And I still would now."

While teen KJ does have some serious biceps and teen Cole looks a bit more like he did in his Suite Life days, that didn’t mean Cole was ready to accept defeat. He hopped on to comment on the pic, writing, “You wouldn’t even have survived the weight of my wallet b*tch.” (Likely a reference to those Disney paychecks and a net worth built from years of being a child actor on TV and in movies like Big Daddy.)

KJ's post then triggered a whole Riverdale reunion. Another expert Riverdale troller, Lili Reinhart, popped in to say that she would have “pummeled” both of them. Lili has “lovingly” poked fun at KJ before, so she’s practically a pro at this point.

Casey Cott, who plays Kevin Keller on the series, jumped in to add, "I would have watched the fight from the sidelines wishing for peace amongst the school." And the Riverdale parents also got in the fun. Skeet Ulrich, who plays Jughead's father, commented, "Neither of you would have even touched my mullet." And Mark Consuelos, who plays Hiram Lodge, wrote (in character), "Kids. Keep it down."

Lorde, meanwhile, was all of us when she commented on the hilarious exchange among the cast members. "Wow i'm dead," she wrote, according to the Comments by Celebs Instagram account. If there's anything to take away from this moment, it's that Lorde is probably (definitely) watching Riverdale (and gushing about how fun the cast is on social media) right along with us.

Let us slide into your DMs. Sign up for the Teen Vogue daily email.
title: KJ Apa Roasts Cole Sprouse on Instagram With a Throwback Photo

meta_data.author: Condé Nast
meta_data.description: "Riverdale" star KJ Apa reposted a meme to Instagram that compares 17-year-old KJ with 17-year-old Cole Sprouse.

og.description: Cole, Lili Reinhart, Casey Cott, Mark Consuelos, and Lorde also weighed in.
og.title: KJ Apa Roasted Cole Sprouse With a Meme of When They Were Both 17
